title: These Rocks Look Great
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pebble and a dwarven beard hair)
text | This spell wards a willing dwarf you touch and creates a mystic connection between you. Choose one of the following wards; you and the target gain that ward until the spell ends.
text | You and the target gain a +2 bonus to AC and gain 2d6 temporary hit points each (roll once for both), which are lost when the spell ends.
text | You and the target are immune to being charmed and frightened and cannot be possessed.
text | You and the target add +5 to any skill or ability check in which stone is concerned.
text | The spell ends if you or the target drop to 0 hit points. It also ends if the spell is cast again on either of the connected creatures. You can dismiss the spell as a bonus action.
text | When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional dwarf for each slot level above 2nd.
